de.businesscode.bcdui.binding

Class SimpleBindingItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.businesscode.bcdui.binding.SimpleBindingItem
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BindingItem

    public class SimpleBindingItem
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for BindingItems read from a BindingSet definition See also WrqBindingItem for the analogy used during actual statement
